name: §aTo §aYour §aRoots
description: You can plant yourself with primary, when you plant yourself you will feed yourself and slowly grow, if you jump you will go back to normal.

badges.text: There are 6 stages of root progression while planted, on stage 1 you will take 60% less damage instead of 40%, on stage 2 you will give saturation to everyone nearby, on stage 3 you will be able to sense entities with your roots making them glow for you, on stage 4 you will give experience to everyone nearby, on stage 5 you will give regeneration to everyone nearby, finally on stage 6 you will be permanently rooted and immortal to all but fire but will have massively more powerful rooted buffs.
